name: PyraMaze
description:
You were left alone at camp. The team you started with is gone.  You wonder where the professor went .  You meet Warp, a multi-dimensional being. Warp wants to help you find your professor and unravel the mysteries of the "Impossible People". 

In this snowy chapter of PyraMaze you will discover more abilities and  climb new heights (literally).

Enjoy!

PyraMaze was originally built for the 32BitJam in October. For the 32BitHoliday jam, I decided to make more content for PyraMaze. The old levels from the previous jam entry are included in this build. Once you finish everything in the snowy areas, you will have access to the jungle level via Warp.

This game is a WIP.   I am  working on more story and gameplay.   This game throws you into the middle of the story without much explanation.  I am    working on that too =D

Please follow       @AsFunAsFun    for any updates on PyraMaze.


(HINT - You don't need to climb the stairs. There is another way to get to the top. Look around the tree.)
